description: Who doesnâ€™t love churros? Crunchy on the outside, soft on the inside and delicious dipped in chocolate.
name: Easy Churros with Cinnamon Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the water, sugar, salt and butter to a saucepan. Mix over low heat until butter has melted.
Add the flours and baking powder.
Mix over very low heat with a spatula, beating vigorously until a ball like mixture is achieved. Rest the mixture and let it cool for about 15 minutes stirring occasionally.
When cooler, add the vanilla and some of the egg mix and beat with a spatula.
Add the remaining egg mix a little at a time and continue beating vigorously with a spatula until a glossy mixture is achieved.
Add to a strong piping bag with a star shaped nozzle and seal until ready to cook.
Heat oil in a heavy bottomed pan or wok and pipe 10-15cm logs directly into the oil. Cut the dough with scissors to make it easier. Cook 4-5 at a time and fry until golden brown.
Drain briefly on a paper towel and then roll in sugar and cinnamon mix while still hot.

Melt some chocolate in the microwave and enjoy some beautiful churros dipped in chocolate. Hint- heat in 30 second increments at 50% power stirring in between each heat. Enjoy these delicious delights with family or friends.
Add the sugar and cinnamon for coating together in a shallow bowl ready for tossing the churros in while they are still hot.
